data.name: Legacy: the last pure heart
data.detailed_description:
People have been at war throughout their history.
And every time they start a war, they forget about the consequences of the previous war.

People do not notice this, but the animals whose houses were destroyed by people during the war suffer the most.
You will learn how animals lived before humanity interrupted their tranquility. Immerse yourself in the animal kingdom.
You have to both become a predator and hunt others, and become a victim to escape from predators.
Sleep outdoors, enjoying the starry skies, or in a safe burrow away from danger.
Become a bird and soar above the clouds. Or by becoming a bear, take care of your cub.

Enjoy the beautiful world before the start of the war and find out what the consequences of the war will be. And execute a righteous judgment on the world, knowing all the circumstances.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: This game is a 3rd person adventure. You will be able to visit the body of many animals of the forest and learn something new about their way of life. You can both play with other animals and fight to the death. You will be able to enjoy a beautiful, realistic world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1 64 Bit, Windows 8 64 Bit, Windows 7 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2120 | AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTS 450 | AMD Radeon HD 5750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3470
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

Minimum:
